channel.title: [525]Some bosses make my server crash
channel.description: Alright, well the title basically states what i need help with. Moved on to 525 a little while ago, getting used to the code. One thing that's annoying and has pretty much stopped my project is whenever i place a god wars boss in it's lair the server crashes. I assumed the npc was too big for it's area, so i put one of them (kree'arra) in a big open, no limits field, and it still crashes. Kinda stumped right now, as i'm trying to add god wars, but every time i go near the npc itself the server crashes. I would be standing outside the boss lair, and i can see the boss inside, then i go into the lair, and boom, server crashes. Thanks to anyone who can help, if you need a picture of the error to further help, i'd be happy to post one.

item.title: [525]Some bosses make my server crash
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Alright, well the title basically states what i need help with. Moved on to 525 a little while ago, getting used to the code. One thing that’s annoying and has pretty much stopped my project is whenever i place a god wars boss in it’s lair the server crashes. Kinda stumped right now, as i’m trying to add god wars, but every time i go near the npc itself the server crashes. I would be standing outside the boss lair, and i can see the boss inside, then i go into the lair, and boom, server crashes. Thanks to anyone who can help, if you need a picture of the error to further help, i’d be happy to post one.
